description:
Adds new Clan variants of existing mechs like the Marauder IIC to the game.

Uses weapons and equipment from YetAnotherWeaponClan.

- Dervish IIC (using the Dervish model1)

- Marauder IIC-A (using the Marauder II model)
- Marauder IIC-B
- Marauder IIC-C
- Marauder IIC-2
- Marauder IIC-2X
- Marauder IIC-4
- Marauder IIC-SC Scorch Hero

- Rifleman RFL-C
- Rifleman RFL-C3

- Urbanmech IIC (using the Urbanmech model)
- Urbanmech IIC 2
author: cszolee79 and trueg
